snippet.title: Game Boy Advance Longplay [052] Gradius Galaxies
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by Tsunao

Konami-developed game.

I guess it deals with the Bacterian again.  Shmup = no plot!!

Same ol' Gradius goodness!  There are four types of Power-ups.

This longplay no-skills through one loop on default settings with Type C.  This ended up wrecking the game.  I also input the Konami code in this game. :3  I missed a secret or something. =/  I was suppose to fly through something.  On Loop 2, the first stage, or something, will have the music from Gradius. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
